article: Summer is the best time on the Island of the Blue Dolphins . The sun is warm then and the winds blow out of the west, _ out of the south. It was _ these days that the ship might return and now I _ most of my time on the rock, looking out from the headland into the east, towards the country _ my people had gone, across the _ that was never-ending. Once _ I watched, I saw a small object which I took to be the ship, but a stream of water _ from it and I knew that it was whale spouting . During those summer days I saw nothing _ . The first storm of winter _ my hopes. If the white men's ship were _ for me it would have come during the time of good _ . Now I would have to wait _ winter was gone, maybe longer. The thought of being _ on the island while so many suns rose _ the sea and went _ back into the sea _ my heart with loneliness. I had not felt so _ before because I was sure _ the ship would return as Matasaip had said _ would. Now my hopes were dead.
